product_name: REI Rainspout Rain Jacket - Infant/Toddler Girls'
long_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Rainspout rain jacket helps keep little girls dry, comfortable and ready to hike in the rain or stomp in puddles. PVC-free rain jacket features a 2-layer waterproof/breathable coating; they are also wind resistant up to 60 mph. Attached hood with brim is fully adjustable and features elastic at the opening to help keep it in place. External stormflap on zipper and adjustable cuffs help seal out moisture. The REI Rainspout rain jacket features pockets with rip-and-stick flap closures.
short_description: The waterproof and breathable REI Rainspout rain jacket helps keep little girls dry, comfortable and ready to hike in the rain or stomp in puddles.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Infants And Toddlers
